Major overhaul of the user interface: Translator with Speech never looked this good! Additional features: quick language selection recent language listing Improved translation engine using the best language sources available

Several bug fixes and usability improvements Improved reliability over slow cellular networks
Resolved iOS 10 issues. Performance improvements. Thanks for your support and feedback!!

Added action extension in Translator Now lets user translate text from any context without having to leave the app. To use Translator extension select text from any app press Share and Select Translator from the options. If Translator extension is not enable select More and Enable Translator Corrected speech speed issue after iOS update. The speech should be fine again thank you!

New: Photo Feature. Now take a photo of any text handwritten or typed and translate it straight away. Recognizes most fonts and handwriting. Will decipher photos fast. Very useful for foreign menu cards notes etc.

Widget added. Now do super fast translations using the in built widget. Translations were never easier! How to use it: Just swipe down on your home screen and the notification new widgets are available will be shown. Then select translator with speech. After that swiping down on your home screen anywhere will bring up the translator widget Clicking on it will perform a translation to the latest selected language taking the text from the clipboard Try it out it is easy to use and very fast.
Support for Apple Watch 2.0 added! Now translate fast using your Apple watch. No need for your iPhone Translator will run as a standalone app.
Resolved an issue with the spoken voice. Thank you for your feedback and support!
